reuters.title: HOLIDAY CORP <HIA> SELLS STAKE IN VENTURE
reuters.body: Residence Inn Corp said it has agreed to buy Holiday Corp out of their equaly-owned joint venture for 51.4 mln dlrs, with closing expected within the next few weeks. The all-suite Residence Inn system, which is geated to extended stays, currently has 93 open franchised or company-owned hotels nationwide and another 55 in construction or development. Reuter 
